chunks.zh: Xiaomi 15 Ultra 手机届的颜值巅峰！
chunks.en: Xiaomi 15 Ultra: The pinnacle of aesthetics in the phone world!

chunks.zh:
![Xiaomi 15 Ultra]( https://cdn.cnbj1.fds.api.mi-img.com/product-images/xiaomi-15-ultra_478157/images/5968.png)

不过还是等等 VIVO X200 Ultra 看看怎么样。
chunks.en:
![Xiaomi 15 Ultra]( https://cdn.cnbj1.fds.api.mi-img.com/product-images/xiaomi-15-ultra_478157/images/5968.png)

But let's wait for the VIVO X200 Ultra to see how it is.

chunks.zh: 对于我这种不喜欢拍照的人来说，背后像一个大大的火疖子。可悲的是现在市面大部分手机都这样，看着都丑
chunks.en: For someone like me who doesn't like taking photos, the back looks like a big boil. Sadly, most phones on the market are like this now, and they all look ugly

chunks.zh: @klo424 你主贴里的图我还能安慰自己，人和人的审美是不同的。但是你发的这张称之为「帅炸」的红色手机，我突然想质疑你的审美了...
chunks.en: @klo424 I can still comfort myself with the pictures in your main post, people have different aesthetics. But the red phone you posted and called “awesome”, I suddenly want to question your aesthetics...

chunks.zh: @Qazxcv123 红魔背面全平也没见你买啊。你们这帮人嘴上说的好听 一到花钱的时候全没影了
chunks.en: @Qazxcv123 You didn't buy the Red Magic with its flat back either. You guys are all talk, but when it comes to spending money, you all disappear.

chunks.zh: 大膏药真是太美了，建议你们多用
chunks.en: That big plaster is really beautiful, I suggest you use more of it

chunks.zh: 大窟窿套小窟窿，小窟窿还大小不一，排列不齐，还有个单独的假镜头用来放徕卡标…我只能说挺难看的。
chunks.en: Big holes inside small holes, the small holes are also of different sizes, not aligned, and there's a separate fake lens to hold the Leica logo… I can only say it's pretty ugly.

chunks.zh: 索尼 Xperia 1 V 不服
chunks.en: Sony Xperia 1 V disagrees

chunks.zh: 我也觉得白的好看，但是黑红的不是很好看。
chunks.en: I also think the white one looks good, but the black and red one is not so good.

chunks.zh: 看着就一股某为的爵士风，老板审美
chunks.en: It looks like Huawei's jazz style, the boss's aesthetic

chunks.zh: 我只能说 2013 年 7 月 11 日 23 点发布的诺基亚 Lumia 1020 生不逢时。https://bkimg.cdn.bcebos.com/pic/8326cffc1e178a82b9013ef08355648da9773912421e?x-bce-process=image/format,f_auto/watermark,image_d2F0ZXIvYmFpa2UyNzI,g_7,xp_5,yp_5,P_20/resize,m_lfit,limit_1,h_1080
chunks.en: I can only say that the Nokia Lumia 1020 released on July 11, 2013 at 11 PM was ill-fated. https://bkimg.cdn.bcebos.com/pic/8326cffc1e178a82b9013ef08355648da9773912421e?x-bce-process=image/format,f_auto/watermark,image_d2F0ZXIvYmFpa2UyNzI,g_7,xp_5,yp_5,P_20/resize,m_lfit,limit_1,h_1080

chunks.zh: 后面那个疤，那么难看，丑出天际，你们能忍？而且还影响手感，就不能扣了？
chunks.en: That scar on the back is so ugly, it's hideous, can you guys stand it? And it also affects the feel, can't they remove it?

chunks.zh: 摄像头太多了
chunks.en: Too many cameras

chunks.zh: 长得像相机就是帅炸吗？有点不理解，我只能说不丑吧，但是实在受不了摄像模组如此巨大，我是真用不上啊。
chunks.en: Is looking like a camera awesome? I don't quite understand, I can only say it's not ugly, but I really can't stand such a huge camera module, I really don't need it.

chunks.zh: 丑。。。。小米系统的 UI 也是我见过最丑的。。。我这种小米杂货铺的颜值党真的欣赏不来手机部门的审美
chunks.en: Ugly... The UI of Xiaomi's system is also the ugliest I've ever seen... I, a fan of aesthetics for Xiaomi's variety of products, really can't appreciate the aesthetics of the phone department

chunks.zh: 确实好看
chunks.en: It does look good

chunks.zh: 人的审美确实是有区别的，你喜欢的别人不一定喜欢，我也挺喜欢这次的设计
chunks.en: People's aesthetics do differ, what you like others may not like, and I also quite like this design

chunks.zh: 对于沉默的人而言 公共场合发这种东西无疑是骚扰 为什么总是沉默的人要被迫接受你们的大嗓门和亮瞎眼的大金牙
chunks.en: For silent people, posting this kind of thing in public is undoubtedly a harassment. Why do silent people always have to accept your loud voices and dazzling gold teeth?

chunks.zh: 那这台 12 年前的手机也挺好看的。。。
chunks.en: Then this phone from 12 years ago also looks pretty good...

chunks.zh: https://imgur.com/a/jS9Rms5
chunks.en: https://imgur.com/a/jS9Rms5

chunks.zh: 补一张，帅炸！
chunks.en: Adding a picture, awesome!
Buy!!!
